EmailTemplate.name: Guidelines for Submitting Copyright
EmailTemplate.subject: Guidelines for Submitting Copyright
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Special Instructions for Architectural Works
To be eligible for copyright protection, an architectural work must have been created on or after December 1, 1990, or embodied only in unpublished drawings as of that date. Please submit one (1) complete copy of an architectural drawing or blueprint showing the overall form of the building and any interior arrangement of spaces and/or design elements in which copyright is claimed.
Special Instructions for Fabrics and Textiles
Please submit one (1) complete copy (or swatch) showing the design repeat and copyright notice, if any.
Special Instructions for Games
Please submit one (1) copy if container is no larger than 12" x 24" x 6"; otherwise, submit identifying material.
Special Instructions for Computer Programs
For computer programs, the U.S. Copyright Office requires a print out of the first 25 pages and last 25 pages of the source code. If the source code is less than 50 pages long, send the entire code. One copy will suffice. Also include the user's manual if there is one.
In addition, if your computer program is embodied on a CD-ROM, the entire CD-ROM package must be deposited, including a complete copy of any accompanying operating software and instructional manual.
Send all materials to our address below:
{!snippetVariable.ip_address_cr_materials}
{!snippetVariable.cccontactline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccassistline} {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. {!snippetVariable.ourrr} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccbizhourline} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
